messages.title: More and more Watford residents are saying...
Why only Dorothy can beat the Conservatives in Watford

mentions.tacticalSituation: The leaflet suggests Dorothy is the main contender against the Conservatives, with historical voting pattern analyses and bookmaker odds indicating a tactical vote for Dorothy could prevent a Conservative win.

issues.economy: The leaflet suggests that the Conservatives will make spending cuts, which Dorothy and the Liberal Democrats oppose.
issues.health: Dorothy is noted as having a track record of action in local service and hospital investment.
issues.socialWelfare: The leaflet suggests protecting public services from spending cuts that the Conservatives might implement.

politicalExperience.achievements: Dorothy has a track record of action and dedication to service.

endorsements.endorsement: Backed Dorothy with concern over Conservatives lurching too far to the right.
Worried by 'Tories' and supports Dorothy for her local hospital and community services work.
Found Conservatives' priorities were not in the best interest of local people and supports the Lib Dems.

images.caption: Dorothy Thornhill engaging with the local community and stakeholders.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses heavily on tactical voting and Dorothy's position as a strong local candidate against the Conservative contender.
